cast.name: 玛丽·斯图尔特·马斯特森 Mary Stuart Masterson
吉娜维芙·汉内柳斯 Genevieve Hannelius

introduction: Sid Sandagger has a good life: two moms, a best friend, an unattainable crush, a gamer crew to blend with. He's on track to graduate high school, un- scathed, thanks to a strict adherence to his personal "code" of conduct of flying under the radar. But when Sid accidentally gets the school's apex predator, Chuck Brawnte, suspended, things change. While Sid survives the initial beating, Chuck promises to finish the job upon his return. With his expiration date looming, Sid musters up all his resources, throws his "code" out the window, bucket lists his life, goes for the girl, the status, the reputation everything. He has two weeks to make all the memories he's spent a lifetime avoiding.
